unnormalised: Crop insurance is vital for Indian farmers, especially those in drought-prone areas like Vidarbha. Schemes like Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) help mitigate losses from unseasonal rains. Timely claim settlement, say within 30 days, is crucial. Dr. Patil's research highlighted yield fluctuations impacting small landholdings (500 sq ft). Need better awareness campaigns in villages near Nagpur and simplified claim procedures. Rs. 2000 crore allocated this year is a good start.
